FIELD3: Effect
All players search their libraries for a basic land and put it into play tapped, then shuffle their library.
Until the start of your next turn, each opponent may only untap one land during their untap phase.
All players lose 3 life.
Until the start of your next turn, the casting cost of all spells is reduced by (1).
All creatures gain +2/+0 when attacking until end of turn.

Until the start of your next turn, all players may cast basic lands as if they were creatures with the following properties: [Casting Cost (2), Haste, 2/2] Mark lands cast in this way with a David counter, they do not count toward the one-land-per-turn limit. At the start of your next turn, remove all David counters and all lands cast in this way revert to basic lands.
Choose an unchosen opponent. Look at the top three cards of their library and put them back in any order. That opponent may copy this effect and choose a new unchosen player.
Target opponent, their hand, library, graveyard, and all permanents they control phase out.
Creatures you control gain flying until end of turn.
Creatures you control gain reach until end of turn.
Creatures you control gain islandwalk until end of turn.
Creatures you control gain trample until end of turn.
Creatures you control gain indestructible until end of turn.
Creatures you control gain mountainwalk until end of turn.
Creatures you control gain swampwalk until end of turn.
Creatures you control gain forestwalk until end of turn.
Creatures you control gain plainswalk until end of turn.
Creatures you control gain melee until end of turn.
Creatures you control gain first strike until end of turn.
Creatures you control gain double strike until end of turn.
Creatures you control gain prowess until end of turn.
Creatures you control gain vigilance until end of turn.
Creatures you control gain deathtouch until end of turn.
Creatures you control gain lifelink until end of turn.
Creatures you control gain hexproof until end of turn.
Creatures you control gain +3/+3 and trample until end of turn.
Creatures that enter the battlefield under your control this turn gain haste.
All creatures take 2 damage.
All creatures take 4 damage.
All creatures take 8 damage.
Gain 1d10 life.
Gain 1d20 life.
Gain 2d10 life. All opponents gain 1d10 life (roll individually).
Each player sacrifices one land, creature, or artifact.
Scry 10.
Take an extra turn after this one.
Draw three cards.
You and target opponent each draw three cards.
Each opponent draws three cards.
Gain four life.
You and target opponent each gain four life.
Each opponent gains four life.
Distribute two +1/+1 counters among creatures you control.
Distribute two +1/+1 counters among creatures you control. Target opponent distributes two +1/+1 counters among creatures they control.
Each opponent distributes two +1/+1 counters among creatures they control.
Each opponent puts the top two cards of their library into their graveyard.
Put the top two cards of your library into your graveyard. Target opponent puts the top two cards of their library into their graveyard.
Put the top two cards of your library into your graveyard.
Each opponent discards two cards at random.
You and target opponent each discard two cards at random.
Discard two cards at random
Until the end of your turn, your lands produce any colour of mana when tapped.
Shuffle your graveyard into your library.
All players shuffle their graveyards into their libraries.
Skip your discard phase.
All players lose half their current life, rounded down.
All players discard their hands and draw seven cards.
Target player discards their hand.
Each player may exile a creature from their graveyard. If they do, they gain life equal to the exiled creature's toughness.
Destroy target tapped creature.
All lands become 2/2 creatures in addition to being lands until end of turn.
Tap three target creatures. These creatures do not untap during their controller's next untap step.
Each opponent loses 2 life. You gain life equal to the life lost from this effect.
Each player loses 1 life for every card in their hand.
Creatures you control gain skulk until end of turn.
All players' life totals become 20.
Create a X/X green Elemental token creature with trample. X is equal to the number of Forests on the battlefield.
Create a X/X red Elemental token creature with menace. X is equal to the number of Mountains on the battlefield.
Create a X/X white Elemental token creature with vigilance. X is equal to the number of Plains on the battlefield.
Create a X/X black Elemental token creature with lifelink. X is equal to the number of Swamps on the battlefield.
Create a X/X blue Elemental token creature with flying. X is equal to the number of Islands on the battlefield.

Name a nonbasic card. Ban this card for the remainder of the game. (Remove all copies of the card in play and in players' hands, graveyards, and libraries. Shuffle any libraries card was removed from.)
Each player gains 1 life for each creature they control. Deal 1 damage to each creature.
Choose three target creatures, planeswalkers, or players. Deal 1 damage to the first target, 2 to the second, and 3 to the third.
Choose three target players. The first target gains 1 life, the second gains 2, the third gains 3.
Choose three target players. The first target draws 1 card. the second draws 2, the third draws 3.
Choose three target creatures. Put one +1/+1 counter on the first, two +1/+1 counters on the second, three +1/+1 counters on the third.
If no sources you control deal damage this turn, until the start of your next turn you cannot be the target of attacks and all damage that would be dealt to you is reduced to 0.
Create X 0/1 colourless Robobutler token artifact creatures with defender. X is equal to the number of nontoken creatures you control. Target opponent may copy this effect.
Choose a letter. Target creature gains protection from cards beginning with that letter.

Create a colourless Bracelet token artifact with "Remove a Talisman counter from Bracelet: Prevent all damage a source of your choice would deal to you or a planeswalker you control." Put four Talisman counters on Bracelet.
Create 2d4+1 0/1 red/white Human token creatures with defender and reach.
Create X 1/1 green Squirrel token creatures. X is the number of lands on the battlefield.
Create X 1/1 black Skeleton token creatures. X is the number of creatures in all graveyards.
Create 1d10 0/1 colourless Thopter token artifact creatures with flying.
Create 1d4 1/1 green Sprite token creatures with flying.
Create 1d3 1/2 red Whelp token creatures with flying and "R: Whelp gains +1/+0 until end of turn. If more that RR is spent this way in one turn, destroy Whelp at end of turn.".
Choose up to five target basic lands. Put a Maple counter on each. Lands with Maple counters are considered snow-covered.
Target creature gains snow-covered landwalk.
Until the start of your next turn, whenever a source deals damage to a target, that source's controller may apologize to the target. If they do not, the damage is reduced to 0.
Choose up to two target creatures. Put a Maple counter on each. Proliferate. Creatures with Maple counters are delicious (Delicious creatures must be blocked if able).
Creatures you control become 2/2 black Zombies until end of turn.
Coin flip direction (Heads:Left, Tails:Right). Players (and any player-attached effects, auras, emblems, etc.) rotate in that direction. All other cards remain where they started.
Coin flip direction (Heads:Left, Tails:Right). Each player's hand is passed to the player in that direction.
Coin flip direction (Heads:Left, Tails:Right). Each player's library is passed to the player in that direction.
Coin flip direction (Heads:Left, Tails:Right). Each player's life total is transferred to the player in that direction.
Coin flip direction (Heads:Left, Tails:Right). All creatures each player controls are passed to the player in that direction. They remain tapped or untapped.
Coin flip direction (Heads:Left, Tails:Right). All lands each player controls are passed to the player in that direction. They remain tapped or untapped.
Gain 20 life. Each opponent loses 5 life. Each opponent sacrifices a creature, artifact, and land. Create 1d3 6/6 colourless Goliath token creatures with trample and reach. You become the monarch.
The game ends. Azathoth wins and consumes the universe. Reality ceases. Congratulations, look what you've done.

All auras are exiled. Shuffle all creatures in play into one pile. Starting with yourself, deal creatures to all players one at a time in direction of play. Repeat with planeswalkers, artifacts, enchantments, lands, and cards in hands.

Each player chooses a number of lands they control equal to the number of lands controlled by the player who controls the fewest, then sacrifices the rest. Players sacrifice planeswalkers, creatures, artifacts, enchantments, and discard cards the same way.

Put a Big Red Button emblem with the following text in play: "Empty all players' mana pools, each player sacrifices all nonland permanents, sacrifice this emblem: Until end of turn, if a player would gain life they lose that much life instead."
Create a 3/5 blue Dream Whale token creature with flying and "Sacrifice Dream Whale, pay 5 life, discard a card: Take an extra turn after this one.".
You gain control of target opponent during that player's next turn.
Roll 1d6: [1=White, 2=Blue, 3=Red, 4=Black, 5=Green] Return all permanents of the rolled colour to their owner's hands. On a 6, return all colourless nonland permanents to their owner's hands.

You may choose a color. If you do, exile all creatures target opponent controls of the chosen color. If you don't, exile all colorless creatures target opponent controls. Return each of these creatures to the battlefield at the beginning of its owners next end step.
Choose a creature an opponent controls. That creature deals X damage to Y target creatures. X is equal to that creature's power, Y is equal to that creature's toughness.

Choose up to 1d8 target creatures. Put X +1/+1 counters on each, X equals 1d6. Choose up to 1d4 other target creatures. Those gain +Y/+Y until end of turn, Y equals 1d20. All players discard 1d6 cards, then draw 1d8 cards. Flip a coin. Heads: All players gain 1d10 life. Tails: All players lose 2d4 life.
Players Vote: Sickness or Psychosis. Sickness: creatures your opponents control get -2/-2 until end of turn. Psychosis/tie: each opponent discards two cards.
Players Vote: Carnage or Homage. Carnage: destroy all nonland permanents. Homage/tie: draw three cards.
Players Vote: Each player votes for a nonland permanent you don't control. Exile each permanent with the most votes or tied for most votes.
Players Vote: Each player votes for an artifact, creature, or enchantment card in your graveyard. Return each card with the most votes or tied for most votes to your hand.
Players Vote: Grace or Condemnation. Grace: each player returns each creature from their graveyard to the battlefield. Condemnation/tie: destroy all creatures.
Players Vote: Time or Knowledge. Time: you take an extra turn after this one. Knowledge/tie: draw six cards.
Players Vote: Death or Torture. Death: each opponent sacrifices a creature. Torture/tie: each opponent loses 4 life.
Players Vote: Strength or Numbers. Put a +1/+1 counter on a creature you control for each Strength vote. Create a 1/1 white Soldier token creature for each Numbers vote.

Players Vote: Wild or Free. Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a creature card for each Wild vote. Put those creatures onto the battlefield, then shuffle the rest into the library. You may put a permanent from your hand onto the battlefield for each Free vote.
Players Vote: Whatever or Persist. Whatever: You win the game. Persist/tie: The game continues. Players who voted Persist lose 2 life.
All green creatures gain +2/+1 and trample until end of turn.
All red creatures gain +1/+1 and double strike until end of turn.
All white creatures gain +1/+2 and vigilance until end of turn.
All blue creatures gain +1/+1 and flying until end of turn.
All black creatures gain +1/+1 and lifelink until end of turn.

Players Vote: Pushups or Situps. Pushups: All players do as many pushups as they can in 30 seconds. Situps/tie: All players do as many situps as they can in 30 seconds. Each player gains 5 life for each exercise they did.
Flip a coin. Heads: Create two 3/3 green Elephant token creatures. Tails: lose 3 life.
Flip a coin. Heads: Deal 3 damage to each of two target creatures/planeswalkers/players. Tails: lose 3 life.
Flip a coin. Heads: Choose up to three target creatures you control. Put two +1/+1 counters on each of those creatures. Tails: lose 3 life.
Flip a coin. Heads: Return two target permanents you control and three target permanents you don't control to their owners hands. Tails: lose 3 life.
Flip a coin. Heads: Choose up to three target creatures you don't control. Put two -1/-1 counters on each of those creatures. Tails: lose 3 life.
Roll 1d6: [1=White, 2=Blue, 3=Red, 4=Black, 5=Green] Destroy all permanents of the rolled colour. On a 6, name a colour, then destroy all permanents of the named colour.
Choose a creature type, then destroy all creatures with that type.
Destroy all artifacts.
Choose a letter. Destroy all nonland permanents with a name beginning with that letter.
Pick a number. Destroy all nonland permanents with a converted mana cost equal to that number.
Name a nonland card. Destroy all copies of the named card in play.
You may sing the chorus from a song. If you do, create two 3/3 red Roc token creatures with flying. If you do not, each opponent creates a 3/3 red Roc token creature with flying.
Starting with you and proceeding in direction of play, all players participate in three cycles of The Wave. Players who make a wave noise may draw 1 card. Players who do not participate lose 2 life.

Reveal the top card of your library. Starting with yourself and proceeding in the direction of play, each player names a different card that starts with the same letter as the revealed card (no repeats). The first player who fails to name a card within 10 seconds of the previous player or who names a duplicate card loses 4 life. Put the revealed card into your hand.
Target creature gains snackwalk.
You may pay X life to put a token copy of any card you own from ouside the game into play, where X is half (rounded up) of that card's converted mana cost.
You may pay X life. If you do, draw X cards.
Proliferate.
Target creature gains denimwalk.
Each player loses 1 life for each cup, glass, or other liquid container on the table.
Each player loses 1 life for each item of clothing they are wearing.
Choose up to five target creatures. Put a Fae counter on each. Creatures with Fae counters have changeling.
Each player places all exiled cards they own on the bottom of their library in any order.
Each player creates 2d6 (rolled independently) 1/1 colourless Zergling token creatures with haste.
Play a best of three Rock-Paper-Scissors match against target opponent. Loser loses half their current life (rounded down). Tie break coin flip (Heads: you win, Tails: opponent wins).
Shuffle all cards in exile into their owner's library. Exile all cards in hand, graveyard and play. Each player draws seven cards.
Creatures you control become colorless Borg artifact creatures. Put a +1/+1 counter on each Borg you control.

Put X +1/+1 counters on each noncreature artifact, where X is its converted mana cost. Noncreature artifacts with +1/+1 counters on them have "0: This permanent becomes a creature in addition to its other types until end of turn."
Draw five cards. You cannot cast spells this turn. Skip your discard phase.
The first four spells you cast this turn cost (0).
Until the start of your next turn, any time a land is destroyed, its controller loses 2 life.
Until the start of your next turn, all creatures you control gain +1/+1 and whenever you tap a land for mana, add one mana to your mana pool of any type that land produced.
Until the start of your next turn, any time a player taps a land for mana, they lose one life.
Until the start of your next turn, all players play with their hands and the top card of their library revealed.
Until the start of your next turn, any time a player taps a land for mana, that player adds one mana to his or her mana pool of any type that land produced
Until the start of your next turn, all combat damage dealt to creatures is reduced to 0.
Until the start of your next turn, all damage dealt by sorceries and instants is doubled.
Until the start of your next turn, all creatures with flying lose flying.
Target player may refill your drink. If they do not, they lose 6 life. If you do not have a drink, slake your thirst for knowledge and draw three cards instead.

Until the start of your next turn, as an additional cost to cast a spell, the controller of that spell must read any flavour text on the card aloud in an overly dramatic voice. If there is no flavour text, they must perform a short, seated interpretive dance of the card's name.
Choose a target creature. Put a token copy of that creature into play under your control.
Choose a target creature. Put two token copies of that creature into play under your control.
Search your library for up to 3 creatures and put them into play, untapped, then shuffle your library. They gain haste.
Creatures you control gain intimidate until end of turn.

Until the end of your turn, you may cast instant and sorcery spells without paying their casting costs. (X) costs must still be paid. Mana spent for an (X) cost counts as 2 points for purposes of X effects.

FIELD2: An almost fanatical devotion to the Pope!
FIELD3: Create 1d6 1/1 white Spirit token creatures with flying.
Create 1d3 4/4 red Dragon token creatures with flying.
Tap target player.
All players may put any number of planeswalkers, creatures, enchantments, artifacts, and lands from their graveyard into play.
All players may put a card they own from outside of the game into their hand.
Switch life totals with target opponent.
You may exchange a creature, artifact, enchantment, and land for a card of the same type that an opponent controls.
Exchange a creature you control with a creature an opponent controls.
Until the start of your next turn, effects that would cause you to gain life cause life loss instead, and effects that would deal damage or cause you to lose life cause you to gain life instead.
Until the end of your turn, ignore the generic mana cost of any spells. Only pay the coloured mana cost.
Exchange a random card in your hand with a random card in target opponent's hand.
Reverse the direction of play.
Skip the next player's turn.
Draw two cards.
Draw four cards.
All players discard down to one card.

Add three mana of any colour to your mana pool at the start of your first main phase. Gain 3 life. Draw 3 cards. Deal 3 damage to target creature or player. Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.
You may pay 2 life. If you do, search your library for a card and put it in your hand, then shuffle your library.
You may sacrifice a land. If you do, search your library for a card and put it in your hand, then shuffle your library.
You may sacrifice a creature. If you do, search your library for a card and put it in your hand, then shuffle your library.
You may sacrifice an artifact. If you do, search your library for a card and put it in your hand, then shuffle your library.
You may search your library for a card and put it in your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.
You may search your library for a foil card, reveal it, and put it in your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.
You may search your library for a creature, artifact, enchantment, land, sorcery, and instant, reveal them, and put them in your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.

FIELD2: How Many Of These Are There?!
FIELD3: Roll two more times on the Chaos List.

FIELD2: By The Gods Below, Make It Stop, Please!
FIELD3: Roll three more times on the Chaos List.
Repeat the effect of the last Chaos roll.
Until the start of your next turn, each player skips their Chaos Phase.
Until the start of your next turn, each player rolls twice during their Chaos Phase.
Flip a coin. Heads: choose an effect on the Chaos list and resolve it. Tails: target opponent chooses an effect on the Chaos list and resolves it.
